mdRecord.dcterms:title: "If E.A.P. of Baltimore -- whose lines about Heaven .. are, though nonsense, rather exquisite nonsense / [with excerpts from Fairy-land]"
mdRecord.dcterms:description: First reference to Edgar Allan Poe in print.--cf. Heartman. A bibliography of first printings ... of Poe.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Copy 1: In one bound volume, containing New series, No. 1-6, July-Dec., 1829. Clifton Waller Barrett Library, Edgar Allan Poe Collection. Gift of C.W. Barrett.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Copy 2: Includes New series, No. 1-6, July-Dec. 1829 in original wrappers. Clifton Waller Barrett Library, Edgar Allan Poe Collection. Gift of C.W. Barrett.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The Yankee, and Boston literary gazette
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Poe, Edgar Allan, 1809-1849--Fairy-land--Criticism and interpretation
